attributes.action: recommend actor Adam Woodyatt for an MBE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Adam has been playing Ian Beale in 'EastEnders' since 1985.

Over the past 22 years, he has clocked up more than 2,000 episodes, and been involved in some of the programmes most successful and popular storylines. 

When not acting, he is often fundraising and supporting charities, such as the Warwickshire and Northamptonshire Air Ambulance, and Cancer Research UK.

We would like to him recognised with an MBE in the New Year Honours List, for his services to drama.
